property.caption: Changes Microflow
property.description: this microflow will run to determine if your form has changes

property.caption: Yes Microflow
property.description: this microflow will run when the user chooses to confirm their unsaved changes. If the microflow returns false, the navigation will be cancelled.

property.caption: No Microflow
property.description: this microflow will run when the user chooses to discard their unsaved changes. If the microflow returns false, the navigation will be cancelled.

property.caption: Prompt Text
property.description: This text will appear in the modal when a user tries to navigate away from the page.

property.caption: Yes Text
property.description: This text will appear on the "yes" button.

property.caption: No Text
property.description: This text will appear on the "no" button.

property.caption: Modal Header Text
property.description: This text will appear header of the modal.
